description: Edge case: Same article number (ART-10000) appears on multiple PO lines with different delivery locations

expected_groups.reasoning: Invoice and Delivery both explicitly reference PO-LINE-010A (Warehouse A). Matching must be based on specific PO line reference, NOT just article number.
Delivery DR-S10-002 references PO-LINE-010B (Warehouse B) only. No invoice yet for this line.

notes: This scenario tests that matching logic uses explicit PO line references rather than just matching on article numbers. All three PO lines have the same article (ART-10000), but documents should only be grouped when they reference the same specific PO line ID.
